body_html:
Is there a libcuda.so.1 in your /usr/lib/nvidia-367 directory? You might have to mess with ldconfig.
I'm not sure how you reached the conclusion that you need nvidia-uvm, but that should be taken care of by the kubelet if you use the gpu resource.
body_text:
Is there a libcuda.so.1 in your /usr/lib/nvidia-367 directory? You might have to mess with ldconfig.
I'm not sure how you reached the conclusion that you need nvidia-uvm, but that should be taken care of by the kubelet if you use the gpu resource.
body:
Is there a libcuda.so.1 in your /usr/lib/nvidia-367 directory? You might have to mess with ldconfig.
I'm not sure how you reached the conclusion that you need nvidia-uvm, but that should be taken care of by the kubelet if you use the gpu resource.
